title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 29.7 - Uncollected taxes
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 29.7 - Uncollected taxes

State Regulations

The commissioner will furnish the county with the completed
UT-11C, "County Vehicle Tax Exemption Certificate," of registrants against whom
a tax was charged but not collected. (a) County Vehicle Use Tax Exemption

Certificate (UT-11C): Image

Notes

29.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
